_description: Fuse.js fuzzy search configuration. See https://www.fusejs.io/api/options.html for all options.

_notes.threshold: 0.0 = exact match, 1.0 = match anything. Lower = stricter. Recommended: 0.2-0.4
_notes.distance: How far apart matches can be. Lower = matches must be closer together
_notes.minMatchCharLength: Minimum characters that must match. Higher = fewer partial matches
_notes.ignoreLocation: If true, matches can be anywhere in the string. If false, prefers matches at the start
_notes.findAllMatches: If true, finds all matches even after a perfect match is found
_notes.keys.weight: Relative importance of each field. Higher = more important for ranking

relevanceLabels._description: Score thresholds for relevance badge labels (lower score = better match)
